name: Airlines Manager: Tycoon 2018
description:
CREATE AND MANAGE YOUR OWN AIRLINE : YOU ARE THE CEO !
Airlines Manager, the best airline management game !

Start with $300,000,00 to buy aircrafts (from the real world) and open thousands airports to travel million of passengers !

Your goal? Become the wealthiest airline in the world!
You will need to take care of marketing, research and development and your finances to make you the best CEO in this business game !

Airlines Manager is the most popular the most popular free airline tycoon game in France and UK. With More than 100 aircrafts and 2600 real airports !

----------

With this airline management game :

• Create your own company with $300,000,000, you have to take care of your money on this airline management game !
• Purchase new aircrafts - at the same price of the real life - to have the largest fleet in the world
• Open new lines to expand your business - You can cover more than 7 million destinations ! Like a real airline sim !
• Schedule your flights and manage the number of passengers at the airport !
• In a look, enjoy the status of your company through the huge live map of your flights !
• Get a loan to your bank to develop your airline even faster.
 
• Manage the occupancy rate of your lines (between 2 airports) and ask for a marketing audit to optimize your prices !
• Unlock one of 500 researches to make your company more innovative, like a real airline manager !
• Do you prefer to be a High Premium Airline or a Low cost Airline ? Manage your airline and your marketing as you want thanks to 200 services for passengers available !

• Use the incredible WorkShop to unlock new bonuses each month !
• Talk to others with the private messaging system
• Play the mini-game "Cockpit Slots" and win a few extra dollars !

• Check in no-time your cash flow forecast !
• Analyze the schedule of the day on each aircraft : Which airport is the most profitable?

• And now, play 7 times faster thanks to the Tycoon Mode!

... And the last but not least : enjoy this tycoon game with high-resolution graphics (with beautiful aircrafts) never seen on the web version of this business game !

Sure, you will see Business differently with this airline management game !
It's like a flight simulator, but for airline in this business game :)
